001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.optimizer;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.model.HyperparameterConfigurable;
004
005/**
006 * Marker interface for components that expose a configurable learning rate.
007 */
008public interface LearningRateConfigurable<N extends Number> extends HyperparameterConfigurable {
009
010    /** The hyperparameter name for learning rate. */
011    String HP_LEARNING_RATE = "learningRate";
012
013    /**
014     * Returns the current learning rate (step size).
015     *
016     * @return the learning rate value
017     */
018    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
019    default N getLearningRate() {
020        return (N) getHyperparameter(HP_LEARNING_RATE);
021    }
022
023    /**
024     * Sets the learning rate (step size).
025     *
026     * @param learningRate the new learning rate (must be > 0)
027     */
028    default void setLearningRate(N learningRate) {
029        setHyperparameter(HP_LEARNING_RATE, learningRate);
030    }
031}
